mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_member where userid = #{userid}

SELECT mem.userid, userpw, username, enabled, regdate, updatedate, auth, post_code, street_address, address, detail_address FROM tbl_member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_member_auth auth ON mem.userid = auth.userid WHERE mem.userid = auth.userid
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(userid, userpw, userName, post_code, street_address, address, detail_address) values (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{userName}, #{post_code}, #{street_address}, #{address}, #{detail_address})
mapper.update: update tbl_member set userpw = #{userpw}, updateDate = sysdate where userid = #{userid}
update tbl_member_auth set auth = #{auth} where userid = #{userid}
